description:
If not us, who? If not now, when? It’s really time to become vocal & aggressive in a non-violent way when it comes to going against vaccines and our rights to not take them. People out there who try to come off as “not anti-vax” are not doing us or themselves any favors.

It goes beyond comprehension to have to even explain to people today that it is a natural born human right to not have an intrusive practice such as injecting genetically modified substances straight into the vein. It is a human right to be sick, to die, and to be left alone if one wants to.

Understand that the most dangerous religion of all is the religion of science. It’s not real science, it’s state-backed science that doesn’t get questioned, because it comes from the authorities. They’ve talked about bringing in a. Scientific dictatorship and keeping it FOREVER. We must push these guys back at the very least. It’s time to commit your life to defending your freedom & standing up for what’s right.  Bill Gates is a scientific dictator — a technocrat. Unelected and more powerful than any president. He’s funded & participated in genocidal projects ranging from GMO foods, Vaccines, Planned Parenthood,  Geo-engineering, and in the future it will be forced abortions by the government to control the population #’s. The religion of science that they’ve given us tells us that the world has too many people — and that we’re destroying the earth — all for a good reason.  Stop believing their lies. 👉 @TruthisTerrorism ❤️💪🧠 #saynotobillgates #arrestbillgates #exposebillgates
